result.purpose: Responsible for metrics collection and management using Prometheus.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating different aspects of metrics handling, including collection, observation, pushing, and server management.

pkg/metrics/metric.go.purpose: Provides metrics collection and management using Prometheus.

pkg/metrics/ops.go.purpose: This file provides functions to observe and measure the execution time of operations using Prometheus metrics.

pkg/metrics/pusher.go.purpose: Implements a metrics pusher to send data to a Prometheus push gateway.

pkg/metrics/registry.go.purpose: Provides a registry for Prometheus metrics collectors with thread-safe access.

pkg/metrics/server.go.purpose: This file implements a metrics server using Prometheus for monitoring HTTP server metrics.
